--------------------------------------------

Detection vs Tracking: A computer vision approach
--------------------------------------------
Computer vision literature exhibits many object tracking and detection methods. Detectors use trained models based on general attributes. Furthermore, trackers learn specific features.

Here, I present a tracking algorithm which combines both approaches leveraging common problems presented in videos.

About PyCon Colombia 2018
--------------------------------------------------

We are excited to share this overview of the second edition of Colombia’s Python Conference: PyCon Colombia 2018  - http://bit.ly/overview-pyconcolombia2018

We want to say thanks to all our sponsors who helped make the conference a huge success.
